items.name: Lake Victoria Panorama Point
items.short_description: Opened in 2023, this newly developed viewpoint offers breathtaking, unobstructed vistas of Lake Victoria and the distant Rusinga Island. Perfect for sunset photography and peaceful contemplation.
items.address: Gwassi Hills Road, near Tom Mboya University, Homa Bay

items.name: Homa Bay Crafts & Culture Bazaar
items.short_description: Established in 2022, this vibrant open-air market celebrates local talent, showcasing handmade crafts, traditional Luo artifacts, and organic produce. Enjoy cultural performances on weekends.
items.address: Off A1 Road, next to the Bus Park, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Rusinga Shores Eco-Lodge & Retreat
items.short_description: Opened its doors in 2021, offering sustainable luxury on the shores of Lake Victoria. Features eco-friendly cottages, guided nature walks, and serene lake access for a truly immersive escape.

items.name: Nyamarambe Wetland Birding Trail
items.short_description: Unveiled in 2023, this accessible boardwalk meanders through crucial wetlands, offering exceptional birdwatching opportunities for local and migratory species. A nature lover's paradise.
items.address: Along River Homa, near Asego Market, Homa Bay

items.name: Homa Bay Lakeside Aqua Park
items.short_description: Opened in 2024, this family-friendly park brings splashy fun to Homa Bay with thrilling water slides, a lazy river, and a dedicated kids' play area, all overlooking the lake.
items.address: Kisumu Road, next to Homa Bay Pier

items.name: The Canvas & Coffee Spot
items.short_description: A charming caf√© and art gallery that launched in 2023, showcasing works by local artists while serving gourmet coffee and light bites. A perfect blend of culture and relaxation.
items.address: Ojijo Road, Homa Bay Town Centre

items.name: Simbi Hills Adventure Camp
items.short_description: Opened in 2022, this camp offers thrilling activities like zip-lining across the valley, rock climbing, and guided nature hikes around the mystical Lake Simbi. An adrenaline seeker's dream.

items.name: Nduru Children's Discovery Centre
items.short_description: A vibrant educational play space for children aged 3-12, inaugurated in 2024. Features interactive exhibits, science experiments, and creative workshops designed to inspire young minds.
items.address: Near Homa Bay Hospital, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Lakeside Grill & Floating Restaurant
items.short_description: Launched in 2023, this unique dining experience offers delicious local and international cuisine served on a gently floating platform on Lake Victoria. Enjoy stunning views with your meal.

items.name: Ondiek Green Community Park
items.short_description: Opened in 2024, this beautifully landscaped urban park provides a much-needed green space for relaxation, family picnics, and community events in the heart of Homa Bay Town.
items.address: Next to the County Assembly, Homa Bay Town
